amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers' operations and maintenance account by $6.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the account for Operation and Maintenance, General by $6,801,000 from $1,854,000,000 to $1,847,199,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilchrest amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 281 (Roll no. 336).
